steps.step: Mix the 2 cheeses in a bowl.
Add the chopped shallots as well as the Gueze Lambi beer.
Mix until you have a homogenous cream. Cover the entire slice of bread with a thick layer of the cream.
Cut the tartine in 4 equal triangles. Repeat with the remaining bread slices.
Place the pieces on a plate and garnish with the sliced cucumber, radishes, and parsley.

Serve.This recipe was provided by professional chefs and has been scaled down from a bulk recipe provided by a restaurant. The FN chefs have not tested this recipe, in the proportions indicated, and therefore, we cannot make any representation as to the results.
